title: Sophisticated Rhode Island Providence Escape with Onsite Steakhouse & Fine Dining Restaurant
description:
Stay in the heart of Rhode Island at this sophisticated and an elegant retreat in the downtown Providence. You'll have the best of Providence at your fingertips, ideally positioned to explore the city's food scene, known for its fresh seafood, and connected to both the Rhode Island Convention Center and the Providence Place Mall.

Savour a delectable menu at Flemingâ€™s Steakhouse, featuring prime cuts of meat and an extensive wine list, or refine your palette at Fleur Providence, serving elegant plates of Parisian-Mediterranean cuisine.
offer_address: 1 West Exchange Street, Providence, Rhode Island 2903, USA
